title: Brunmontagne
description: Brunmontagne, Represents You. 'Stand out without exaggerating and suitable for any occasion', Pascal Bruinenberg, founder.

about.quote-part-3: That is the philosophy behind Brunmontagne watches. Unique, stylish and timeless.

items.content: Our latest discovery is the Brunmontagne brand. A great, up and coming brand that makes beautiful watches for a decent price.
items.author: fhm

items.content: The cabinet shape, the Genta-esque cabinet, is really cool. With its sunburst, the record is a real pleasure to the eye. I think the hands are very well done, you don't hear much about that in my opinion. The price is great, because you get a lot of value for money.
items.author: Amaris - Horlogeforum.nl

items.content: Your brand is one of the few new brands that hasn't picked up a design. It is unique, yet it feels familiar and that is a nice combination.
items.author: Nihat UludaÄŸ

items.content: What a design and what top quality. Bought quite a few watches over the years, but none can match this topper. Very happy with it!
items.author: Jari

items.content: Have it for one year now. Wear it daily and quality is good... Still happy with it.
items.author: J Wester
